Subject: Good but not great
Author: Bill
Review: Overall the toilet is what I expected and easy to install. While the toilet functions as promised the kits (unlike others we researched) did not come with a wax ring or a toilet seat. In addition one of the two units was also missing basic parts like the rubber washers.

Product_name: American Standard  Colony White Elongated Standard Height 2-piece Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size
Subject: Broken on two orders
Author: Joun
Review: Ordered this toilet twice and both times it came in broken.

Product_name: American Standard  Colony White Elongated Standard Height 2-piece Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size
Subject: Dissappointed
Author: booboo1
Review: I don't like the toilet seat. It doesn't tighten fully and the seat moves from side to side. I also don't like the slow closing lid. It needs to be made of something other than plastic.

Product_name: American Standard  Colony White Elongated Standard Height 2-piece Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size
Subject: It's a toilet people
Author: Bcat
Review: This toilet is very much the same as the one I had prior to it. The only minus is no seat is included, but I had wanted a resin seat so it didn't really matter anyway.

Product_name: American Standard  Colony White Elongated Standard Height 2-piece Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size
Subject: A good flush certainly beats a full house.
Author: Antiquetuck
Review: The earthquake caused the old tank/base interface to fail. This toilet was a good deal and replacement.

Product_name: American Standard  Colony White Elongated Standard Height 2-piece Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size
Subject: Great fit and features
Author: Kelly 8
Review: I’m so happy with my new toilet it was exactly the size and fit for my new home.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: For good flush, needs slight modification
Author: James
Review: For the price and look I would give this a 5 star however, trying to make it a "watersense" the flush is so quick that the side walls do not properly clean. you might want to buy another flush valve and replace the installed one. As noted in my pictures, the flush valve is 3.5 inches above the base which leaves little available water to flush and, my tenant required two flushes (and a scrub brush to clean the side) so, if you want a full flush, that is long enough to "do the job," buy another f...

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Author: Roxy
Review: Besides the lid being too small. It's a pretty good toilet. It's only 100bucks so really you can't ask for perfection. But it works how it should and pretty happy with it. Though I would like a fitted lid so the males can get off my back about it.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: really a good buy
Author: Texan
Review: I've had this for about a month. I have mostly bought total Drakes in the past which are the top rated by most plumbers. that is what I'm comparing this to and also American Standard Cadet 3 which is also a very fine toilet. I paid $100 for this toilet and had someone else install it but I normally install them myself. I had the Fluidmaster waxless seal which work great. this toilet has quality features usually seen in toilets twice to three times the price. first of all it has a 3 inch flush valve and a fully glazed 2 in trapway. the fill valve is a Fluidmaster which is the top of the line. the flapper appears to be just a standard 3 inch flapper. when comes to replacing it I'm going to use a Fluidmaster which has a silicone seat on it and a hard plastic frame. I measured the water spot which is slightly smaller than the American Standard get three I measured 8 in or slightly above front to back. my complaints about the total Drake is that it has more skid marks and not as good a wash down as some of the ever brands. I think American Standard has a little better wash down. both Americans standard and Toto have special treatments on the glazing inside the bowl. I have found that the project Source toilet flushes in my opinion as strongly as a total Drake and possibly stronger than the Cadet 3. I think it's washed down it's about similar to both of those or possibly better than the total Drake. the total Drake and the American Standard are advertisers having special extra smooth glaze within the bowl. that was not an advertised specialty of this toilet but I did not notice much difference. Some things I point out as negative. 1) the siphon trap has a kink in it compared to the American Standard check my picture out. 2)the tank to bowl bolts appear to be brass plated Steel. when buying it I would buy some solid brass or stainless steel tank to bowl bolts. 3)the water spot is slightly smaller than the American Standard Cadet 3 but I felt that the wash down is just as good or better than the Cadet 3 and definitely better than the total drake. overall a great value. I highly recommend it. see my photos. #1. water spot size 8 in. #2 trapway has a kink in it not straight like the American Standard possibly a source of Clogs. #3 picture of the fill valve and flush valve inside the tank appears to be Fluidmaster fill valve and a very nice 3 in flush valve.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Toilet lid cheaply made
Author: Tammy
Review: Toilet easy install. Good overall except lid does not sit down snuggly & or cover all of unpainted sections of toilet lid. Material still shows thru so makes toilet look so cheap. Very disappointed but did not uncover tank lid until toilet had been completely installed.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: grest toilet for a great price!
Author: TexanStrong
Review: Like most Texans, Valetines day was just a disaster. Pipes busted and toilets were damaged. As soon as stores were open, there were long lines and shelves were empty. Fast forward a week, I had to replace two toilets and luckily I found this gem and it came with everything. When I say everythinng, I mean everything. Wax, bowl internals all came with the toilet and it was so easy to install. Directions were easy to read and it took more time hauling the old one out. Definitely a great buy! Also if your toilet wobbles becausebits not flat on the floor, you have to use wedges because your floor isn’t leveled. Use pennies, thats what I was told.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Poor quality control.
Author: Paul
Review: I bought the chair height versin of this product this morning. Started installation in our guest bathroom and discovered the plastic nuts and covers for the floor bolts were missing. Back to Lowe’s for free replacements. Rest of the install was uneventful. Everything worked fine. Then my wife discovers a crack in the porcelain on the lip of the bowl. No, I didn’t drop it or do snything that would have caused a hairline crack. So now I’ll have to uninstall it and hope Lowe’s will take it back as Ive broken down the packaging. Totally awful quality control, or product handling or both. So much for saving money. I’ll replace it with a Koehler. You really do get what you pay for.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: best buy toilet period!!!
Author: Craig
Review: This toilet is the best buy out there!it's replacing the aquasource henshaw model which consumer reports rated the best buy toilet!3 inch flush valve not 2 inch makes it super powerful!!!Definetly the best toilet out there and I been doing this a long time

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: A great value, strong flush, and assembled tank!
Author: Jasper
Review: Overall I thought this was a really good value for a replacement toilet and the flush power is drastically higher than in previous 2” toilets I’ve had. The kit comes with everything you need to install it including a wax ring although I ended up using a jumbo ring for a more durable seal. I also really liked how the tank was completely assembled including the studs in the bottom. I didn’t have to rig up the flush system or anything, really making this a nearly tool-less installation. I did end up upgrading the handle with a black Korky kit from Lowe’s to match my other toilet, as well as a soft close American Standard seat, but even with those it was about $150 all in. I like that it looks close enough to a Toto Drake in my master bathroom to pass on casual inspection, and the flush power of the 3” valve makes it reliable for even the most “demanding” guests.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Great toilet
Author: camshaft
Review: Toilet works great, easy installation, everything needed was in the box. Replaced all 3 toilets in the house, primarily to get the higher chair height. We did not intend to use the included toilet seats so the fact that 2 out of 3 toilet seats were broken was not a problem. If you were relying on using the included seats, this would have been a problem. See picture. Expect the toilet seat got broken when it was dumped into the package. Would have been 5 stars if the seats all arrived intact.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Awesome setup
Author: meridian
Review: I had this toilet for over a month waiting for work to be done. Once I unpacked it, I was extremely impressed in the packaging. The insides of the toilet were already installed so all I had to do was attach the wax ring (included), bolt the toilet to the floor (bolts are included), and then bolt the tank to the toilet (also already included). Then attach the water line (not included). The tank already had the flapper and the water installed along with the tank bolts fastened so there was nothing to do but turn the water on and check for leaks. No leaks, which was amazing to me... no slow leaks into the bowl, no leaks around the tank. It's been a long time since I've purchased a toilet so having all this prefab work done already took a 2 hour job down to 30 minutes.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Extended and Elongated Toilet
Author: Veronica
Review: Just what I was looking for and wanted

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Side by side comparison to name brand!
Author: Mmmmmmmelodie
Review: Remodeled my two bathrooms. Mine and my husbands bathroom got a name brand 'pro flush' while my 16 year old son's got the 'off brand' Project Source. I'm NOT his housekeeper so it never gets cleaned, while mine gets cleaned several times a week. To be gross, I dont walk away from skid marks...husband does. My name brand doesn't do very well at rinsing so I clean it at least 2-3 times a week. Two weeks ago we had company coming over so I hit my sons with his never used toilet brush. It was kinda gross in there. The pictures are from today, two weeks later. I even asked him "You by any chance cleaning your toilet??" He was like "uh....no..." I'm 100% wishing I'd gotten the "off brand" now. We have well water, but we BOTH have well water. His seems to just naturally repel stains and mine does not. This is a 6 month old toilet. (Obviously mine is the stained yellow photo...)

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Amazing
Author: Carolyn G
Review: I replaced 2 original 23-year-old contractors' toilets that had been repaired several times. For the deductible from home warranty companies, I should have just replaced initially. They are ADA compliant which is huge. The old ones were at a level reserved for children. My recommendation is to just replace your toilet if it develops problems. The price for the round toilet is just $89.00. I bought the elongated one for $99.00. My son said the installation was easy. Only one flush is needed, and the tank refill is swift and quiet. I am very pleased with this purchase.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Dont buy it's an irregular fit
Author: Judy
Review: The lid is way smaller than the seating area. Looks weird but I cannot afford to pay to remove and replace with another brand. Also Toilet is not as high as mentioned on box

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Make sure you buy a new hose going to the wall.
Author: Kevin
Review: Very nice and easy to hookup

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Great water saver
Author: Sewe55
Review: Great affordable toilet, easy to install. Chair high is great. Uses a lot less water than my old toilet. The toilet seat on the cheap side but ok.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Quality toilet, easy install, cheap seat
Author: Jeff
Review: I've installed about a dozen of the Aquasource Henshaw toilets around town in our various rentals and have always been pleased with the value and ease of maintenance. When I showed up a Lowes a few days ago to find out they were discontinuing the line I was not pleased - but this is the replacement for it and it's easily as good and in fact they improved a few things. The mounting parts for the bowl to the floor are better (hand tighten bolts and snap on covers). The flushing mechanism is simple and yet they raised it off the bottom of the fill tank a couple inches which lets sediment and such (big here in Tucson) fall to the bottom which I think is a better design. I put in two of these new models in this week and I'm pleased with them. They have, however, continued to ship a completely lame flimsy plastic seat so we use a heavier duty after market seat instead. But given this unit is $99 having to buy a better seat is small potatoes in my book.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Ck before installatio u cant yrust box
Author: Pinky
Review: The toilet in the box was not chair height, Clearly stock no said chair height but it was regular and we r 74 urs old and need the height and the lid to tank was broken in three pieces the plumbmer opened the box and installed not knowing it was wrong now we have to pay to have it removed, drive 54 miles gas is 4.59 a gallon to take it back and pay plumber to reinstall it! We r very dissapointed

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: How you don't have the same luck as I have had.
Author: Disappointed
Review: This was my second toilet from Lowes in the past week. The first one arrived with the install, and when the box was opened the unit was cracked in pieces. That one was returned and I bought this one. This one was installed some days later by a Lowes installer and it wont hold the water in the bowl. I am still waiting for the installation people to come back and take this one out and try again. :(

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Affordable toilet, that works great
Author: apara223
Review: This toilet looks and works as good as models costing hundreds more. At first I was a bit concerned buying a $99 product, however, after it was installed, I thought it looked really good. My only complaint has to do with a toilet seat. The seat included is a thin plastic seat which bends and flexes when you sit on the toilet. Lowes sells an inexpensive old wooden style seat for $12. I replaced the seat that came with my toilet. Wish the toilet came with the wooden seat from getgo.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Reasonably priced. Quality product.
Author: Linda B
Review: Good value for the price. I purchased two and would purchase again. Sturdy and good flush force.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Toilet-yes Stickers-no
Author: April
Review: This is a fine toilet so far. I especially love these multiple random blue sticker that are placed on each toilet, that serve no purpose other than to make my life difficult.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Great value, performance and fit!
Author: Chris G
Review: The value was great but only because it works great - especially for the efficiency it provides. I was going from a 3 gallon per flush unit so I had reservations, but no worries now. The added plus was that the base was wide enough to cover the footprint of the previous toilet which helped avoid an aesthetic nightmare.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Nice
Author: Lynn
Review: The height was good. The toilet was easy to install.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: NOT A CHAIR HEIGHT
Author: Cher
Review: I wish I had seen this before my husband installed this, it’s not as high as the toilet I had. If you want a chair height don’t get this one unless you have short legs.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Easy and quick to install
Author: FloridaSteve
Review: Needed to replace an old standard height toilet and decided on a chair height elongated. Didn't need a big fancy model, just one that worked. This matched all my wants. From the time I picked it up at Lowes, to being completely installed was just at 3 hours, by myself and removing the old one. Fit perfectly and everything was there. Really liked how the tank flush mechanism was preinstalled and the wax ring was included. Didn't have to make any return trips to get things not included and all you need is the wrench for the bowl bolts, and a scraper to remove the old wax ring from the mount. Good value if your just looking for a toilet.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Super good and cheap toilet！！
Author: Matteo
Review: The function of the toilet is very good,Obviously, it can wash away all solids, and its price is far lower than American Standard and Kohler. It has the same quality as American Standard. It is my best choice.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Great looks and easy to install
Author: modemz
Review: This is really easy to install. I replaced a round toilet with this elongated one as kids outgrew the round toilet. The great part is that this toilet takes up less depth from the wall compared to the round Delta toilet that I just replaced! The tank lid is actually good and it is not just a lid that sits on the tank but fits into the tank - so it's a tight fitting lid and not just a lid that sits on top of the tank. The flush seems quite powerful. As other reviews have mentioned the lid is super flimsy, but anyway I am getting a brondell bidet to replace the lid and didnt care about that. if you want a soft close or a better lid, just buy that separately.. the toilet itself is great.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Recommended 100% by a master plumber
Author: OCROOTERGUY
Review: This is one of the best toilet I’ve ever e installed, my customer bought this toilet at Lowe’s she asked me to install it, when I finish with the installation OMG !!! This is a great toilet so from now on I’ll be installing this brand, thank you Lowe’s for having such a great product.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Useful
Author: Kelly
Review: I purchased the toilet for my mom. She thoroughly enjoys it. Especially the height as she is having health issues.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Nice Product!
Author: RevChasBM
Review: I love the appearance and comfort of these toilets. I bought two of these toilets to replace the toilets in our two bathrooms as we have changed up the color scheme a bit. They look great and are very comfortable! I always like the longer bowl verses the rounder bowl. I find them much more comfortable to use and less likely to see accidents from young or old folks with poor aim. All in all, I am very happy with these commodes. They are very attractive and highly functional. Not at all difficult to install either!

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Great commode
Author: JanR
Review: Bought the project source commode to replace a Briggs commode. The PS commode is a basic toilet but exceeds in function. Chair height was perfect as well as the trap made for easy quick flush. This commode has the standard Flowmaster gravity flush system which can be easily replaced/repaired - no canister crap like the Kohler brand or the aqua piston like American Standard.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Good with negatives
Author: JonBoy
Review: Dear Jon, Overall I'm good & would do it again, butttttt...Plastic nuts hold the toilet to the floor. Plastic nuts fasten the tank to the toilet. Tank rocks big time & scared to tighten too much & break the tank. Approx 3" of water stays in bottom of tank always, because the base that the flapper closes on, is jacked up way high. Tank lid seems to not fit good. Flushes great

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Your getting quality for a lower price.
Author: Jojo
Review: I first was attracted to the price and shape of the bowl. Now that they have been installed in my Mobile home (they fit perfect) I’m in Heaven! Wonderful product and price.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: One person can install alone. I did and I’m 77.
Author: Alex
Review: Easy to install. All the accessories in the box. Not expensive. Don’t waste your money on the higher priced toilets. Just replace the seat with a more efficient one.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Great Toilet for a Great Price
Author: AngelPW
Review: I bought two of these as replacements for two in my home. They are GREAT, they Flush with "enthusiasm". They are slightly taller than my old toilets, which I like. I highly recommend these toilets.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Check the toilet before you leave the store
Author: Jacob Hussa
Review: It was broken when we got it. Lowes won’t let you return it either

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: EXCELLENT
Author: belovedroofer
Review: I’ve been a landlord for 35 yrs. I just installed this toilet in under TEN MINUTES! Great, considering thus happened at yhe end of a 14 hr day...

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Can't go wrong!
Author: Arky
Review: This toilet, for the price, is FANTASTIC! It's heavier than the one I replaced. It uses minimal water. I think it would flush golf balls, but I'm on a septic tank and wouldn't try that. With my military discount, it was under $100 out the door, including tax.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Chair Height toilet
Author: Jack
Review: I went to buy an Aquasource Henshaw but it's been discontinued & despite inventory showing several in the local stores no one could find them. This is the replacement, very similar in size & function. I didn't use the plastic seat that comes with the toilet, like the Church seats Lowes sells much better. The box that contains the wax seal also has the floor mounting hardware parts AA & BB but not CC & DD, those are in the bubble wrap bag with the toilet seat making them easy to miss if you aren't using the stock seat.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Love the height
Author: Gardenwitch
Review: The bathrooms in our house had the old fashion low toilets. We are doing new flooring in our home and decided to replace the 2 toilets and the guest bath vanity and light. It's amazing how spending under $300. we have 1 bathroom that looks like it's brand new and the other has a nice tall new toilet. The height makes a lot of difference when you get older or are tall. So much more comfortable. We didn't want a lot of bells and whistles, just the basics but taller. Great choice.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Buy this not the expensive ones
Author: NeeNee
Review: The fact that it was less than 100 bucks was a huge plus! Who the heck needs to spend so much on something that does this one thing? It was super easy to install, and the fact that it is chair height is great. Looking at the more expensive toilets this one uses the same amount of water . I just wish I would have remembered that I need a longer hose in the back since it is chair height

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: high quality toilet
Author: larrybob
Review: The toilet and inner workings are beautiful and top quality. The included seat is cheap and flimsy, but at the price you can get whatever nice seat you want and still save money. Great buy and totally recommend.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: good toilet
Author: bron
Review: Good flushing toilet. Great proce. Only thing crappy is the cheap seat it comes with.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Ease of installation
Author: TheRobe
Review: Great packaging and all items needed for installation were included.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Good part.
Author: Dupe
Review: The only thing I have to complain about is the seat cover, is made with plastic vey thin and bends when i sit on it. I would advise to get a much strong one made of wood. Justin & Rita D.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Don’t let the price fool you.
Author: LaLa
Review: Cheaper than others that were similar; works great

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Definitely worth the money
Author: Kephart1069
Review: Replaced and OLD toilet with this one and it was great! I love how easy it flushes and that it doesn’t use a whole lot of water like the old one.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Not great
Author: mpwebster
Review: I purchased two of these toilets and installed them. Once they were installed, we quickly diacovered they didnt flush everything down as expected. After opening the lid, I discovered that the flap drops too quickly and the valve is so high that very little water actually is involved in the flush. Rather than remove the toilets and argue with lowes for a retuen, i purchased the fluidmaster 3” valve kit for $16.98. The swap is relatively simple and only requires removing the bolts holding the tank to the base. In total, its about a 10-15 minute fix. Make sure to adjust the flapper to 10 so it stays open longer for a better flush. In the end, the toilet now works but at an additinal cost, time, and effort. I cannot recommend tbis toilet.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Basic functional
Author: Timothy
Review: Plain, complete, easy assembly, reasonable price, functional.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Good purchase-recommended
Author: Pattyc1
Review: I like everything about this toilet, even the price

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: factory defective toilet.
Author: luisdp
Review: bought 2 in a row, both defectives, toilet seat leak internally and dont hold water level . don recommend.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Great toilet if all you do is pee
Author: JB55
Review: Builder grade crap, literally. Usually takes two flushes as the flushing power is so poor, even for the ladies after a #1, as it often times can't manage to get the tp down. And, if you #2, be sure you have a brush handy as it sticks like glue (sorry to be graphic). They were installed in our new house. Four months later we're replacing them. It might make a decent planter. But, as a toilet, it's horrible. There is a reason why the price is so low. Pro Flow No Go!

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: great product for the price
Author: Terry j
Review: its higher up and easier to stand up since I have bad knees and it works like a charm

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Great product!
Author: SHicks
Review: Great product! Our older or disabled residents especially appreciate that it sits up higher than a standard toilet making it easier to get on and off of. Great price point compared to like products available.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Better packaging
Author: Jake or tony
Review: I drove around trip 50 plus mile to purchase 3 comodes and 2 had broken base. I then had to replaced them at my local lowes store and had to buy the 119 dollars ones.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Stop complaining about the toilet seat. Seriously.
Author: Salt
Review: Easy transaction, painless install. Everything works like it should. For those of you complaining about the toilet seat and how chincy it is, you bought the cheapest toilet available at Lowe's. Go use the money you saved and buy yourself a frou frou toilet seat of your liking. You get what you pay for. It flushes both numbers just as it should.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Great product - good color selection.
Author: Dande
Review: great product. installation was easy and works perfectly. We needed an off white color, and the color was PERFECT.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Looks good. We'll see how it holds up.
Author: Clayboy64
Review: Install was easy and looks as good. as a $300 toilet. I bought it for a rental property so we'll see how it holds up

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Author: Lisa
Review: Inside already needs replacement, after less than 3 months of being installed. Water continuously runs.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Inexpensive, works good
Author: Gendo
Review: Replaced my toilet with this item. Easy install. The only thing I do not like it the way the tank fits on it is not the most secure feeling. The warranty card stated limited lifetime, but time will tell. At least the base is pretty stout

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Great toliet
Author: Victor
Review: The price is great and it is chair height and flushes well. What more can you ask for

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Best Toilet
Author: Pacer
Review: Best flushing toilet I have ever purchased. Easy to Install. Great Price!

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Love the old fashion flush.
Author: A Jewel
Review: Love the old fashion flush. Easier and cheaper to clean and maintain

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Great Value for Flush Power
Author: Mvtampa
Review: Great value for a solid product with flush power! Impressed!

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Came with plastic bolts
Author: Senior Living Facility
Review: Came with plastic bolts we replaced with standard bolts

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: The toilet seat in the box does not fit rim well
Author: kt82
Review: I was looking for the handicap height toilet. The boxes were marked chair height and standard height. I asked an employee who was not very knowledgeable and in too big of a hurry to help. Even though the chair height one I purchased is taller than the standard height, it is not the handicap height

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Toilet damage
Author: Patti
Review: Product was broken upon arrival. The delivery drivers didnt even get it off tge truck. The box was all smashed up, tgey ooened it and found the problem. Not sure why they would put this on the truck without checking it when there was obvious damage to tge box when loaded.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: So far so good!
Author: Daylily14
Review: Since you don't buy a toilet often, I did a lot of research. I found this brand got excellent reviews, and so far I agree. I haven't had it long so this is what I think. It is sleek looking and has a powerful flush, which is great! The seat is plastic but nice looking. The plumber liked it. I think I made a wise choice!

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: U can't go wrong with this toilet
Author: Fyahmanstan
Review: I really love my new toilet , water save , powerful flash, the looks its wonderful

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: White toilet
Author: Arttie
Review: Easy install, works just fine. Toilet seat is a bit cheap, plan on buying one when purchasing toilet to save yourself a trip.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Does the job
Author: Zack
Review: Does the job, but mediocre. Didnt come with the floor bolts or the nuts to secure them, or the caps to cover them. Had to run to the local hardware store since Lowes is so far away. Must have been packaged at the factory on a Monday…

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Everything yoy need is in the box.
Author: Johndlcla
Review: Just what I needed and it was in stock, which got me out of a bind.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Solid toilet for the price. Smaller than standard.
Author: DadBod
Review: It's a solid toilet. Way better then the store-brand ones that were in my house from the Orange Box store. It is smaller than your regular toilet. Only complaint was that some of the toilet bolts and nuts seemed to be missing, nothing that $1 at Ace couldn't fix.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Comfortable height and flushes well
Author: MOD78l
Review: Well made, flushes very well & uses little water, comfortable height. Have bought 3 and highly recommend them.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: you get what you pay for.
Author: Tony
Review: the water level in the toilet is not as high as expected. sometimes I have to flush twice. if the box was not destroyed I would have returned it two days later.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Very good toilet
Author: Alan
Review: This was a easy install everything needed came with it. Gives a good flush. Good design and finish.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Inexpensive but I would buy it again.
Author: vvcougar71
Review: It was easy to install and it works fine and the price was great. I'd buy it again in a heartbeat.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: display at Lowes too high to inspect product.
Author: Jerry
Review: Factory defect tank leans to left tank lid does not fit even with tank. Not satisfied.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Best buy!
Author: Kurt
Review: Great value & quality for the price, just as good as toilets costing twice as much

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Perfect height
Author: Elle
Review: Chair or “comfort” height is definitely worth any additional money

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Great toilets for the price.
Author: bekmk
Review: This comes as a kit with everything included except the high pressure hose. The height is perfect and not low to the floor like the old ones.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Great value
Author: Mindy B
Review: Great toilet for the price! It checks all of our boxes - chair height, elongated, water efficient. So far, the flushing capabilities have been fully sufficient :) We were even able to cover the cost with a rebate from our water service for upgrading to more efficient water use.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Fantastic Buy
Author: jojimbe
Review: My son had one of these toilets and I liked it so much I ordered one for our home. Our original one was short and round, used a lot of water to flush and still didn't do that great. This Project source toilet is a little taller, and flushes like a power flusher using very little water to do so. Itt seems to me it only uses approx. a half a gallon. The elongated shape seems to be more comfortable to set on. It was super easy to install and it only took about 10 minutes. It has everything you need to install except for tools. Very pleased with my purchase. You can't beat the price either.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Great!!
Author: Jmsmall
Review: This purchase is a great value and works well. It is high enough that my mom can get up.and down easily.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Good product
Author: liza_bam
Review: Looks good, actually, does not have that cheap bathroom vibe. The seat is decent too. No problems with installation. For the price i definitely recommend

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Great for the money!
Author: GuyP
Review: Have replaced three old style short toilets with $250 American Standard toilets. They work great and are very easy to keep clean. Have an upstairs guest toilet that also needed replacement. Saw this toilet for $99 and thought would give it a try. Much to my surprise it looks good and performs well. I’m not sure it will be as easy to keep clean since the finish doesn’t seem as nice, but for $99 it seems just fine!

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Everything that could go wrong
Author: Will Shopelsewhere
Review: Ordered two toilets, both arrived broken. Tracking said they arrived together. In reality one arrived the day following the first delivery. I don't know if the breakage was because the product is cheaply made or just poor delivery service. The burden of the return was left to me. No genuine acknowledgement of the inconvenience. Decided to do business elsewhere.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Fantastic buy
Author: Texokie
Review: Easy to install, well made, looks great in the bathroom; love it! Only thing I don't like is tgat the lid is not a slow close

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Required Parts missing
Author: Sharath
Review: Required Parts missing. Asked Lowe’s about it and they gave parts that don’t fit it. Over all worst experience.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Nice Toilet
Author: MMurphy
Review: Excellent toilet for the guest bath. Great color and flushes large and disgusting waste products effortlessly

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: keeps running
Author: CJH1
Review: The toilet flushes fine except it sometimes will not stop running. We have a holding tank and it is expensive to pump out.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Comfort
Author: Arnold
Review: It's very comfortable to sit on very little effort to get on and off it.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Toilet
Author: Bruno
Review: Nice toilet, inexpensive and chair height. It’s very easy to install.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Great value
Author: Mikey
Review: Came with everything neede for instalation. Wworks perfectn

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Good Quality Toilet
Author: Jones Clan
Review: I bought two of these toilets and we are very pleased with them.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Great price!
Author: EMan
Review: Great product for great price! I have been pleased!

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Decent toilet if its not broken.
Author: Bigboppa
Review: We bought 4 of them because 2 were broken in the boxes. The plastic clips to bolt the base down are poorly designed. The floor flange bolts are not long enough. 1/4” longer would be better because the threads on the plastic nuts start 1/4” into the nut. Poor design.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Author: proofinthepudding
Review: Always flushes immediately and easy to clean and stays clean:)

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Chair height not the same as handicapped height
Author: JaySay
Review: I like that it seems to use less water in flushing and it takes less time for the tank to refill. I wasn't really happy with the height because I had had a handicapped height before but have gotten used to this chair height. I purchased it while it was on sale with a good price.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Great Toilet, cheap seat
Review: toilet kit installed quickly and works well with the exception of the toilet seat which seems flimsy and always on the move. Love the height of the toilet

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: No lid. On backorder for months
Author: Geez
Review: Who knowingly packages and sells a toliet without a lid? It's been 5 months now and still on backorder. Shame on you!

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: With the extra height you may need a longer water
Author: Bud R
Review: This Water Sense toilet works very well the tank top fits good, better than the tank top on a Kohler that it replaced. It flushes good also. It's a very good toilet for the money, no need to spend a lot more for a toilet when this does the job.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Info is misleading
Author: bh2522
Review: This toilet came up on a search of ADA compatible items and the information calls it "chair height" and indicateds that it is good for people with disabilities and/or mobilty issues. That, to me, means it is a toilet that sits up higher (chair height???). When I got it home I discovered that the toilet bowl height is 16.5" not the ADA recommended 20" Now I have to load it back into the car and return it. Yuck! Probably a good toilet if you are not looking for a taller one.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Great basic toilet.
Author: George
Review: Excellent value! No need for expensive alternatives!

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: You may need to purchase a separate seat that fits
Author: JaeLyn
Review: The item is attractive; flushes well. However, the seat that came with the toilet doesn't fit. When seated, the bowl and the seat don't line up and, consequently pinch my leg. Hurts.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Emergency Bathroom Repair
Author: Raider
Review: Good quality product at a fair price --- the installation team was very prompt, accommodating and professional. We definitely recommend them or use them again!

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Remodel
Author: LRA1
Review: Remodel the whole house and this was a perfect fit . Installed myself, went great!

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Wax rings are old hat, the newer rubber is better
Author: ADBS
Review: I prefer this type of commode seal over was wing especially when I know I will be removing and reseating the commode several times. It is a better method

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: You get what you pay for.
Author: CCassady
Review: Cannot recommend. A majority of the mouting parts are plastic and do not reflect the images shown in the instruction. while securing toilet to the floor mount the plastic washers broke, turning the screws in the mount so the toilet is no longer secure. Replacing requires me to go get hardware AND a new wax ring because it is now ruined.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Pieces might be broken
Review: The seat & close flap was broken at the back where you attach it

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Close fitting lid
Author: Swan J
Review: Sleek, modern design. Lid fits snuggly on tank with no gaps.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Toilet
Author: Bigjohn76
Review: I like it you sit on it and take a dump seems to be able to handle massive loads and lite loads with no problems the water flow to clean the bowl seems to be keeping up with the usage highly recommended by a serious user!!

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Check the height!!
Author: Bill
Review: The bowl is far too high above the floor. Old toilet was 14" this one is 17" Legs go numb.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Author: Montanaboot
Review: I love this. Toliet. 1 of theses days I want 2 more just like them. There awesome

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: pro-flush toilet
Author: proctor1951
Review: looks nice and works good so far easy to set would buy again

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: This toilet is horrible, it’s going back, run away
Author: Kelo
Review: Lesson learned don’t buy the cheapest Project Source toilet at Lowes. I was replacing our 15 year old toilet, expecting something that would flush super well and have no issues. Failed from the beginning. Zero instructions on the Fluidmaster guts included, so I spent an hour on my own researching how to adjust the water fill level. Then the stupid Fluidmaster 540 flapper…happens to be adjustable, so you should be able to adjust how much water for each flush. Nope. After finding out HOW to adjust it from between 1-10 on the stupid thing, it makes no difference. Slams right shut, so if you want any actual water for flushing, you can stand there and hold down the handle. Entire piece of junk is going back tomorrow. What a huge waste of time. I’ve spent thousands if not tens of thousands of dollars at Lowes over the years, but if this is the quality of their store brand, I’ll never touch it again. I’ll go buy one elsewhere.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Great Toilet, Bad Parts Department Service
Author: RB52
Review: Good replacement toilet. Easy to install and nice looking. Would give it one more star but it was shipped without a tank to bowl gasket. It was a frustrating 4 days of back and forth emails with Lowes parts before they finally relented but then ordered the wrong part for shipment. Fortunately, Lowes customer service was extremely helpful and got the right part ordered for shipment within 20 minutes including wait time. Great service from the customer service team!

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: One great flush
Author: Redleg
Review: Product works perfectly according to daughter in law. Just make sure you get 2 wax rings one wasn't enough.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Bottom line its a cheep toilet
Author: Tommy Triggerfish
Review: The toilet is of poor quility. The horn is very small

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Open your boxes before leaving the store.
Author: Jrabins
Review: Bought 3 toilets. Got them home and one was broken in several pieces. That was very inconvenient.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Great deal
Author: Pamela
Review: I like the height of the toilet. And how easy it was to assemble. And I like the seat that comes with it.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Disappearing Water..
Author: Slim214
Review: Purchased 2 of these project source toilets, and installed. After a days worth of flushing, 1 of the 2 toilets water level disappeared in the bowl. i adjusted the the dial on the fill valve, and after a couple of flushes toilet maintained water in bowl. After a few weeks of flushing the water would drain from the bowl leaving a little bit of water at the bottom of the bowl. the other toilet is working as it should.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Low Price, Low Water Usage
Author: Ole farmer
Review: I liked the low price for this toilet that uses far less water than the toilet I replaced. Knowing that it did not have a slow closing lid was not a problem for me since I simply used the lid and seat from the toilet that was replacing since I had just recently put a slow closing lid on the old toilet. Installation was straight forward and the "how to video" that Lowes has on their website was very helpful.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Excellent
Author: Hemidemisemiquaver
Review: Everything that was supposed to be in the box was there. The finish on the toilet is flawless and the tank lid matches the tank. The assembly was the easiest I have done on any toilet. I also prefer the large 3" flapper valve over the leaky hard to replace canister valves that are becoming the norm. Set up properly the toilet performs perfectly removing waste. For the price this toilet cannot be beat.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: CAN'T GO WRONG WITH LOWE'S...
Author: TROUBADOUR
Review: THE PRODUCT WORKS GREAT - AND THE PRICE WAS REASONABLE.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: It’s ok.
Author: Twar
Review: Where tank connects to bowl there is a faulty o ring. Leaks. Faulty o rings caused the challenger to explode. So they are more important thank you’d think.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Super Deal!!
Author: Crowe62
Review: A super deal!! No complaints!! Would definitely buy again!!

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Great product
Author: Ken j 821
Review: Good product and works very well and easy installation!

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Project Source Toilet
Author: Mark R
Review: Definitely priced right but comes with a very cheap toilet seat. Additionally my unit has issues with the flapper hanging up and not making a good seal causing the tank to constantly run no matter what I do with the chain length. If I could re-due my decision I would have picked a different unit out.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Time will tell.
Author: Cris
Review: ADA approved, good pressure and easy to install. Just wish less plastic parts.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Great Value!
Review: This is an excellent toilet. It flushes very well and looks good. My only complaint is they cheapened up the toilet seat and it is very very embarrassingly thin. I would get another one which adds about 15 or $20 to the cost of the toilet project. Great results for half the price or less of a Kohler or American standard.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Low quality
Author: Customer
Review: The toilet bowl is good, but the lid is too small. The seat is cheap and is too small for the bowl.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: No more “falling” feeling
Author: skipster456
Review: I had the exact toilet in another house. Love that it’s elongated and it doesn’t feel like you are sitting on kindergarten toilet! Nice and high!

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: N
Author: Blkkkk bad service
Review: You send three times a toilet all broken and you delayed my project

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Author: PZerr
Review: Did curb side pick up, box was damaged and toilet was broke. did not realize since the employee loaded the item into the truck

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: good value
Author: Tomcat
Review: Surprising to get a complete toilet at this low price. But the seat is very flimsy. I'll be replacing that. The toilet was well packaged. Instructions could have been better. No mention of the rubber seal that goes between the tank and toilet, but I figured it out.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Make sure has all parts
Author: Nick
Review: It was missing the wax ring and rubber seal for the tank

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: NICE ADEQUATE ELONGATED TALL TOILET
Author: zzzzcharlie
Review: Unit was packaged well and it arrived intact. Gets rid of poop just like the $300 ones. Here's a little detail missing from the specs: the bolts that attach the water closet to the bowl are not on 6" centers. They are about 6 1/2" Has FluidMaster fill valve.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Worth the money
Author: James
Review: Easy to install, if done properly no leaks for a very long time, and can be cranked down really tight to secure tightly to any floor surface without breaking. Finish holds up very well too. Elongated bowl and comfortable height is great to have for the cost.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Great Experience
Author: MBHeller
Review: Everything needed but the supply line was included in the very reasonably priced toilet. We had 2 delivered and installed by Lowes installers. They did an excellent job and we are very happy. This is an excellent value and it works very well.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Standard, good-quality toilet
Author: JLGe
Review: It is a standard toilet, and does what it is supposed to do. If I had one complaint, is would be that it could have included a slow-close seat, which is pretty much what most people have in their homes these days.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Comfort with clean flush
Author: BAlady75
Review: Price was great since two toilets were being replaced, 1.28 GPF saves water, it flushes fast and thorough. As a senior with two full knee replacements, I wish I had moved to higher and elongated toilets sooner.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Outstanding value!
Author: ibokay
Review: Probably the best flushing modern water saver toilet I have ever owned.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: great value for plain jane toilet
Author: fisher
Review: These toilets work great and look great. They are just plain toilets without all the water saving features, which is just what I wanted. I am pleased with them and it is hard to beat the price.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Everything included except new supply line.
Author: Hsternfan
Review: Nice packaging, price was reasonable, looks nice, functions well. The only potential negative is the included toilet seat is not a slowcloser. But I had a new toilet seat to install.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Good toilet, cheap toilet seat
Author: Nicolem1
Review: I really liked this toilet, but the toilet seat it cheap. It's all flimsy plastic. I sometimes put the lid down to sit on it and the lid bends and slides. Otherwise it's a good toilet

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Broken
Author: LeeB
Review: I used curb side pick up. The employee put a damage unit in my SUV. I discovered the damaged toilet after I uninstalled the old toilet. Annoying!!!! Do not use curbside pickup.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Don't buy
Author: PatH
Review: Toilet does not sit flat on the floor, too muuch wobble.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Good purchase especially for the price
Author: Mara
Review: Great purchase at a great price. We haven’t had it too long quite yet but so far so good.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Good budget friendly toilet.
Author: GLGL
Review: Good toilet, installed by local plumber. A little wobbling movement as tank does not sit down onto base completely, fixed with wooden wedges between tank and base.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: What we wanted
Author: NanaP
Review: We really like this toilet. The size is perfect for my 6 foot+ boys. I also like it and I’m 5‘3”!! It was easy to install. It uses less water to flush as well.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Pro-Flush
Author: John
Review: Store rep understood what i was looking for. Bought and installed the new pro flush in less than 30 minutes. Works super great. Lowe's...thank you!

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
Subject: Service sucks
Author: Disappointed
Review: What’s the sense of telling you, I wrote couple weeks ago and got no reply back, so take your question and put it where the sun doesn’t shine

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)

Author: RocketChk
Review: Really happy with what we got for the price point. It looks nice and we're able to supply them new to our residents and stay within budget.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)

Review: We bought this toilet so it was easier for me, who is disabled, and my son, who is 6'3". It is easier but did add a 2" toilet riser.

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)

Product_name: Project Source  Pro-Flush White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In Size (Ada Compliant)
